QuestData.Title: Unsolid Ground
QuestData.Description: The Twilight Cult are mining jade crystals near their camp.$B$BFoolish...$B$BReckless...$B$BGather the mined crystals. Take them to the center of their camp. Shatter them against the ground.$B$BThe reverberations and the powered crystal will bring the tunnelers upon them.$B$BThey will learn respect for the earth...$B$BPiece by piece...$B$BRock by rock...$B$B...with time.
QuestData.LogDescription: Gather 6 Jade Crystal Clusters, combine them, and shatter them within the Lorthuna's Gate encampment.
QuestData.CompletionText: BThey will learn respect for the earth...$B$BPiece by piece...$B$BRock by rock...$B$B...with time.
QuestData.RewardText: Time brings respect to all.$B$BThe smallest pebble.$B$BThe largest mountain.$B$BThe most stubborn cultist.
